name: Emergency Ambulance Driver Simulator: Modern Day Hero
name_original: Emergency Ambulance Driver Simulator: Modern Day Hero
description:
Best ambulance simulator of 2016! There was an accident - someone called 911. You're on-duty medical ambulance driver. Get on the car and get the doctor and paramedics rescue team to the injured person as fast as you can. Every minute matters! Lives are at stake. This is a state of emergency! Turn on the sirens / buzzer! Rescue the victims of an accident, bring them to the hospital and become a hero! Drive fast, mind the traffic, find alternative route to the accident scene. Car crashes, commuting accidents, ill people, gang shootouts victims bleeding. These are the things the rescue team must deal with every day and night. Turn the sirens on and step on it! As you are professional on-duty ambulance driver you have to use agility, courage and pro driver skills to get to the traffic accident first - and in one piece. Drive through real traffic jams, be extra careful on intersections, mind the traffic. You are playing against time and dense traffic. That's the real challenge. Sometimes it looks like impossible to get the ambulance to the person in need on time - just be smart and find another route! Get there before the police or firetruck! Be a modern day hero driving the ambulance! Emergency team in the back, doctor gets the medicines ready, medics are prepared for the action, all is in your hands - drive them safely to the accident place. EMS or NHS - no matter what country. Paramedics must be prepared for actions all the time as people may need medical attention due to some health problems. Get the real emergency car drier experience! Speed driving is awesome and epic in this game! Nothing is impossible for pro ambulance driver!

Challenging missions
Astonishing gameplay
3 different emergency trucks
Unique combination of city traffic games and ambulance simulator games
Difficult traffic jams
Save injured and wounded people
Get the paramedics and doctor to the victim ASAP
Get the ambulance driver experience
Upgrades (nitro, v8 engines, tyres etc. - buy them by watching ads!)
City rush game and city traffic game with best quality for free!
more police and fire truck games will follow shortly
heal people and get them to the hospital!


This game contains no violence so it can be played by kids or girls. Girls would love to play this game!

1. Drive through the traffic jams
2. Get the experience of ambulance driver
3. Become a modern day hero!


See other police, military or firefighter games! If you want something different then try our USA Parking Ace game or the one dedicated to the girls: Parking Princess! Just click "see other games".
